src:
Jadwal Liga 1 Sabtu Ini: Ada Persebaya dan PSS Sleman
01 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Liga 1 Indonesia pada Sabtu, 2 November 2019 akan menyajikan tiga laga. Salah satunya ialah pertemuan Persebaya melawan PSM Makassar.
Persebaya Surabaya datang ke Stadion Batakan, Balikpapan dalam keadaan terluka. Setelah menelan kekalahan dari PSS Sleman, tim berjuluk Bajul Ijo ini harus menjalani laga kandang di luar kota dan tanpa dihadiri penonton saat melawan PSM Makassar.
Pelatih Persebaya yang baru, Aji Santoso, punya pekerjaan rumah yang tidak sedikit. Selain harus mencari cara agar tim bisa kembali meraih poin, ia juga mesti memulihkan mental dan motivasi para pemain.
Sementara PSM Makassar di laga nanti harus bisa mengatasi persoalan fisik. PSM sebelumnya menyatakan keberatan dengan perubahan lokasi pertandingan. Sebab skuad Juku Eja sudah bersiap tampil di Surabaya.

Berikut Jadwal Liga 1 Indonesia Sabtu Ini

PSIS Semarang vs PSS SlemanPersebaya Surabaya vs PSM MakassarBhayangkara FC vs Semen Padang FC

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
League 1 Schedule This Saturday: There are Persebaya and PSS Sleman
01 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian League 1 on Saturday, November 2, 2019 will present three matches. One of them was the Persebaya meeting against the Makassar PSM.
Persebaya Surabaya came to the Batakan Stadium, Balikpapan in a state of injury. After swallowing defeat from PSS Sleman, the team nicknamed Bajul Ijo had to undergo a home match outside the city and without the audience attending against PSM Makassar.
The new Persebaya coach, Aji Santoso, has a large amount of homework. Besides having to find a way so that the team can get back points, he also must restore the mental and motivation of the players.
While the PSM Makassar in the fight later must be able to overcome physical problems. PSM previously expressed reservations about changing the location of the match. Because Juku Eja's squad is ready to appear in Surabaya.

Next Schedule Indonesia League 1 This Saturday

PSIS Semarang vs PSS Sleman Surabaya Surabaya Surabaya vs PSM Makassar Bhayangkara FC vs Semen Padang FC

INDONESIA LIGA
